sen.j: 明応2年（1494年）死去、嫡男・定昌に先立たれていたため、家督は末子の房能が継承した。
sen.e: Fusasada died in 1494, and as his heir Sadamasa died ahead of him, his youngest son Fusayoshi succeeded him.
